sentence: for example , post- communist countries are in the sample for nine to fifteen years , which does not allow shocks to fixed effects to diminish over time ( the nickell bias ) .90 secondly , the cbi index and polity iv scores vary little within countries , and fixed-effects models lead to greatly inefficient estimations.91 to address these problems , we present system gmm models.92 the gmm estimation deals with several shortcomings in the data , including the short time span in the sample , fixed individual effects , and potential heteroscedasticity and auto-correlation within countries.93 in the gmm regressions , we only use up to the second lag of the variables for the regression in levels , in order to reduce the number of instruments and the risk of over-fitting the data .
